pgTitle: List of Nottingham Forest F.C. players

rows.text: Influential early player who pre-dated league football; became chairman whilst still a player
||DF||1964–1977||422||23||Youngest player to play for Forest at the time
Won a League title and League Cup trophy with Forest Ranked #17 in Times' all-time Forest players list
PFA Players' Player of the Year
||MF||1978–1987||171||15||Youngest player to play for Forest at the time
